model.interfaces
Interface IModifiableGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

Type Parameters:
NodeType - the type of nodes in the graph
All Superinterfaces:
IGraph<NodeType>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Graph
public interface IModifiableGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>
extends IGraph<NodeType>

The interface modifiable graphs must implement. It allows nodes to be added, removed, and to be marked as initial nodes.

Author:
Sigurd Schneider

Method Summary
 void add(NodeType node)
          Add the node the graph
 void addInitial(NodeType initialNode, java.lang.String relation)
          Mark initialNode as initial with respect to relation.
 void remove(NodeType node)
          Remove the node from the graph

add

void add(NodeType node)
Add the node the graph

Parameters:

remove

void remove(NodeType node)
Remove the node from the graph

Parameters:
node - the node to remove

addInitial

void addInitial(NodeType initialNode,
                java.lang.String relation)
Mark initialNode as initial with respect to relation. Implementations should make sure that initialNode is in fact a node of the graph.

Parameters:
initialNode - the node to mark as initial
relation - the relation with respect to which the node should be initial
